question:
Consider the following statements about the Traditional Knowledge Digital Library (TKDL):
  1. It involves documentation in a digitized format of traditional knowledge available about Ayurveda, Unani and Siddha
  2. It aims to make the knowledge available to international patent examiners in only two languages viz. English and Hindi
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Traditional Knowledge Digital Library (TKDL) is a collaborative project between Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR), Ministry of Science and Technology and Department of Ayurveda, Yoga & Naturopathy, Unani, Siddha and Homoeopathy (AYUSH) & Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. It involves documentation of traditional knowledge in digitized form, related to Ayurveda, Unani and Siddha. Traditional Knowledge Resource Classification (TKRC) makes the knowledge available to patent examiners in patent application format and in a language that can be understood by them. Currently, the information is available in five languages viz. English, French, German, Spanish and Japanese.
